meanings.definition: Having the ability to absorb a large amount of liquid.
meanings.sent1: The sponge was superabsorbent, soaking up all the spilled water quickly.
meanings.sent2: The superabsorbent diaper kept the baby dry for hours.
meanings.sent3: The superabsorbent towel was like a thirsty desert gulping down water.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was superabsorbent, taking in every detail of the lecture.
meanings.sent5: The superabsorbent paper towel was like a thirsty sponge, eager to soak up any spills.

meanings.definition: A material or substance that can absorb a significant amount of liquid.
meanings.sent1: The superabsorbent in the diaper made it perfect for long car rides.
meanings.sent2: The plant gel beads are superabsorbent, helping to keep flowers fresh.
meanings.sent3: The superabsorbent powder turned into a gel when it absorbed water.
meanings.sent4: The superabsorbent material in the kitchen cloth made cleaning up spills easy.
meanings.sent5: The superabsorbent sponge was a lifesaver during the plumbing leak, soaking up water rapidly.
